name: Dawn of the Karen
description:
They're coming to get you...

Live the ultimate retail worker's dream in the penultimate Karen-blasting simulator of 2022. Today the customer is always right - on their way to heck!

Our hero is a sales associate pushed to the brink, who after spending their shift front-facing their displays is dismayed to see a horde of angry shoppers descending upon them. Take up your trusty upgradeable Norf gun, defend your displays, and never let them speak to your manager!

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim and shoot

Ludum Dare

Dawn of the Karen was made for the Ludum Dare 50 Game Jam. It was made from scratch by a small team in 72 hours, for the theme Delaying the Inevitable. We leave it to your interpretation whether that means fighting for your life, or a critique of late stage capitalism.
